DataElement.preferredName: Prior Hormone Therapy Receive Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response to determine patient eligibility for clinical trial related to the prior administration of various treatment modalities that produce the desired therapeutic effect by means of change of hormone/hormones level as outlined in the study protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prior Hormone Therapy Receive Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order._Various treatment modalities that produce the desired therapeutic effect by means of change of hormone/hormones level. To take, accept, or get something offered._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria._

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:Various treatment modalities that produce the desired therapeutic effect by means of change of hormone/hormones level. The treatment may include administration of hormones or hormone analogs to the patient, or decreasing the level of hormones in the body by using hormone antagonists, or hormone ablation therapy. The concept covers but not limited to: intermittent or permanent hormone suppression or ablation in treatment of hormone-dependent tumors, hormone replacement therapy of any kind, hormonal component of gender reassignment therapy, hormonal contraception, surgical and radiation castration.

Concepts.definition: Various treatment modalities that produce the desired therapeutic effect by means of change of hormone/hormones level.

Property.preferredDefinition: To take, accept, or get something offered.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: To take, accept, or get something offered.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Did patient receive prior hor
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient receive prior hormone therapy within 2 weeks prior to treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received long-acting somatostatin analogs (e.g., long-acting octreotide) within 4 weeks prior to initiating Lutetium Lu 177 dotatate?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received long-acting somatostatin analogs (e.g., long-acting octreotide) within 4 weeks prior to initiating Lutetium Lu 177 dotatate and during treatment?
